The sound of weapon's fire echoed around Tavatron. It would be
suicide 
to  stay, but if Dinobot chose to stay and fight she would stand 
beside him. She wasn't about to abandon him now. She watched as 
Dinobot fired off multiple shots at the aproaching Alliance. Tavatron 
growled softly, if they were going to battle then so be it. She 
unsheathed her sword and began to fire multiple optic blasts in the 
general direction of the approaching 'bots. Tavatron almost didn't 
notice when Dinobot transformed, her attention being directed 
elsewhere. When Dinobot spoke her head snapped in his direction. He 
wanted her to ride him? Well, there's a first time for everything. 
Tavatron quickly climbed aboard Dinobot, wrapping her arms about the 
base of his reptilian neck. She layed her head against his back and 
waited for him to start running:

"Let's get out of here!"
